paragraphs.text:
Registrations are coming from outside See here, the RDW.

Registrations have a start date (from) and an enddate (till) , see course material entity Registration.
We added an extra field 'newPaymentRequestDate' for our bookkeeping to the registration that is initially equal to 'from'.

Let us start first Update our initial position (see new 'ProduceData.java'), Note we are now becoming serious, we have to generate the payment requests ourself!
And now our first try to generate payment requests.
Second try to generate payment requests.
Let us go to next lesson to improve this...
